weapons.Get.description:
WEAPONS [Shared] 

[string] classname
  Class name of weapon to retrieve

weapons.GetList.description: WEAPONS [Shared] Get a list of all the registered SWEPs. This does not include weapons added to spawnmenu manually.

weapons.GetStored.description:
WEAPONS [Shared] 

[string] weapon_class
  Weapon class to retrieve weapon table of

weapons.IsBasedOn.description:
WEAPONS [Shared] Checks if name is based on base

[string] name
  Entity's class name to be checked

[string] base
  Base class name to be checked

weapons.Register.description:
WEAPONS [Shared] 

[table] swep_table
  The SWEP table

[string] classname
  Classname to assign to that swep
